Reviews

Review by - Yelp

Taryn W.:

Cannot recommend Paisano's enough! We lived on James Island for 3 years and ordered from here at least once a month, and everything was always delicious. My favorite menu items are the chicken parm pizza and Italian hot sub. My husband loves the chicken parm sub and hot wings. But honestly, you can't go wrong with anything on the menu.

Review by - Yelp

Cara H.:

This little pizza place was very delicious and quick. I ordered pizza Togo for me and my family and the pizza was a great price and the staff was very nice and got me my order and side sauces to go. Definitely recommend this pizza. They had other items that I would have loved to try but didn't have time while on vacation. Will definitely go back to try the wings.

Review by - Yelp

Remi Louise F.:

I always tell my friends that they can only tell if I like the pizza if I ate the bone. This is surely one of the pizza where I ate the bone. It is fresh out of the oven. I love how it is not salty or overly oily. The toppings are perfect amount and spread out. Will surely be back! I'll edit this review once I tried their wings.

Review by - Yelp

Grace P.:

The BEST pizza on James Island for sure! This place does it right. Really affordable and can feed a lot of people. Every time I order, my food comes out perfectly. Placing a pickup order is simple and quick. I always go for a classic cheese pizza - the seasoning they use is fantastic!

Review by - Yelp

Jesse J.:

Best delivery I've had in along time. And we use Uber eats at the office all the time. Gyros are awesome, Taziki sauce is better than Athens was. Fries were great and still crispy even in the storm and their wings are always great. Best blue cheese maybe best in Charleston
